meanings.sent1: Playing music loudly disinhibits some people.
meanings.sent2: Having a few drinks disinhibits social interactions.
meanings.sent3: The costume party disinhibits even the shyest individuals.
meanings.sent4: The sunset disinhibits a burst of colors in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The laughter of children disinhibits joy in the room.

meanings.definition: To free from restraint or inhibition
meanings.sent1: A walk in nature disinhibits stress and worries.
meanings.sent2: A good book disinhibits the imagination.
meanings.sent3: The dance floor disinhibits everyone to move freely.
meanings.sent4: The fresh air disinhibits a sense of freedom.
meanings.sent5: The kind words disinhibits a flood of emotions.
